title: The Magic Bike
description: Jayden receives a letter that says he won a contest, even though he did not enter one. When a big box arrives, Jayden is surprised to find a bike inside. Students will enjoy predicting what might happen to Jayden and his magic bike. Supportive illustrations and high-frequency words make this a great story for early readers.
meta: contest, envelope, instructions, magic, mail, prize
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Discriminate Initial Consonant Blend : Discriminate /st/ sound
Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final st blend
Contractions : Recognize and understand the use of contractions
Synonyms : Understand the meaning of synonyms

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
